news.title: Mac DeMarco Shares New Song “Phantom”: Listen
news.summary: The final preview of his imminent album Guitar

news.title: Belle and Sebastian Announce Tour Celebrating Tigermilk and If You’re Feeling Sinister Anniversaries
news.summary: The band will play two nights apiece in cities across North America and Europe, performing each album in full—plus the hits—in separate shows at each stop

news.title: Wednesday Share Video for New Song “Bitter Everyday”: Watch
news.summary: The fourth and final single from the Asheville band’s forthcoming album Bleeds

news.title: Famed Hoboken Venue Maxwell’s Is the Subject of a New Documentary—and Its Makers Want Your Videos and Photos
news.summary: No Backstage at Maxwell’s will feature archival footage, photography, and interviews on the historic indie rock venue that hosted Nirvana, Hüsker Dü, and more

news.title: Westerman Announces Album, Shares Video for New Song “Adriatic”: Watch
news.summary: The British musician releases A Jackal’s Wedding in November

news.title: Florence and the Machine Announce New Album Everybody Scream
news.summary: The Dance Fever follow-up arrives on Halloween

news.title: Bar Italia Announce Album, Share Video for New Song “Fundraiser”: Watch
news.summary: Titled after the 1959 film starring Marilyn Monroe, Some Like It Hot is out October 17 on Matador

news.title: Tom Waits Shares Tribute to Longtime Collaborator Robert Wilson
news.summary: “Over 40 years of loving Bob and still he astounds,” Waits wrote of Wilson, with whom he staged several theatrical productions. “We will always be suspended in his orbit.”

news.title: Watch Jeff Tweedy’s Video for New Song “Feel Free”
news.summary: From the Wilco frontman’s triple album Twilight Override
